title: POLL: "Preset items" gone on the new client, would you want it back ?

replies.body: Devs intend to create an item set creator for the updated client!  Per the [legacy retirement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/legacy-client-officially-retires-april-24) announcement, they aim to start once we've all transitioned over to the updated client.  Thanks for sharing your feedback, it's been heard!
